current_contact.agency: San Bernardino County Sheriff Department - Coroner Division

case_address_found_1: Open desert near intersection of Kismet and Amadore
case_circumstances: John Doe #03-83 was found in the open desert in the city of Yucca Valley.  The body was that of an Hispanic male, between the ages of 20 and 40, with black hair and brown eyes, stood 5'8", and weighed 160 lbs.  His skin pigmentation was irregular, with areas of darker and lighter skin (right upper arm/shoulder.  He had several scars: an 8X2.5cm teardrop-shaped scar on the lower left back, a long scar on the left lower abdomen, scar on right inner forearm, and star-shaped scar on the right shoulder.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is available and entered
